title: Web Design in 4 minutes
text: This is a step by step guide on the basics of CSS styling. I think it's brilliant by how simple and well presented everything is.

title: Learn CSS Layout
text: Another styling resource. Hope it doesn't show that I struggle with this. This time is a layout guide with plenty of examples and tips.

title: StackEdit
text: In-browser Markdown editor. Excellent for editing README.md files with live preview.

title: El Tamiz
text: One of the firsts blogs I found, it contains wonderful articles about various topics of physics and chemistry. Sadly, it hasn't been updated in a while but the content is worth checking out.

title: El Gato y La Caja
text: This is an awesome scientific divulgation site. Everything about it is great. The design, the content quality, the depth of every topic covered... and it's made in Argentina.

title: Many But Finite
text: From the about page: This is a site for curious people interested in learning about technology and science, but who want rigorous material that stays true to source code, papers, and data. No hand-waving or mushy analogies - we give you the real deal.

title: 3D Content Central
text: 3D parts library. It allows to export them in several formats.

title: Miro Online Whiteboard
text: Really useful online app to make conceptual maps, flowcharts and all kinds of visual representations.
